commentary.text: Hello ladies and gentleman and welcome to another classic derby between Arsenal and Chelsea
That was a huge opportunity for Willian, he just could not score 1 on 1 with the goalkeeper
Chelsea are really trying to get the possesion of the ball right now, it's been minutes since Arsenal have touched the ball
And that was the referees wistle, we will be back here on Emirates stadium after a 15 minute break
WHAT a SHOT, Pierre Emerick Aubameyang shocks everyone and scores with a header, Arsenal 1 - Chelsea 0
So after 2 minutes of stopage time, we come to the end of this amazing dervy between Arsenal and Chelsea, against all odds the gunners managed to win this game
